Subbed Projects.Show Name: Mashiro-iro Symphony: The Color of Lovers

Good Comments: Horrible translation for most of the episodes. Worse in practically every way compared to Oyatsu and Doki-Chihiro.
I like TL notes, but Oyatsu is better.
Speedy releases, only reason why you wouldn't get Oyatsu's stuff.
Without even getting into typesetting or translation, their timing alone is displeasing to the eye. Go with Oyatsu or Doki-Chihiro
They make it hard for people to make it in the group but there's still mistakes in their work. Wtf?
Not much wrong with the latest episodes. Great job :)
Bad Comments: Guesslations. Really, even an idiot can spot the translation errors.
Very good translation in term of speed.
TL notes are outdated relics that should have been done away with. Oyatsu translated the script without issue.
TL note incredibly useful for people who don't know a lot about Japanese culture or language
No. Just no. fail translation, and wtf is a 1v0. Go with Oyatsu guys.
